description: A scuba diver observes a colossal bathtub stopper resting on the ocean floor. The stopper's chain extends across the seabed among starfish, creating a surreal scene where a common household item is bizarrely placed in a marine environment. The image evokes an absurd notion of the vast ocean being treated like a drainable vessel. The presence of palm trees visible near the shoreline further emphasizes the unexpected context for this enormous, misplaced object.
